No Permission: You don't have permission to use this command.
May Not Open Wallet In Event: You may not open a wallet while participating in an event!
User ID not Found: Could not find player with ID '{0}'
User Name not Found: Could not find player with name '{0}'
Wallet Over Capacity: Your wallet was over capacity. Overflowing items were added to your inventory or dropped.
Blacklisted Items Removed: Your wallet contained blacklisted items. They have been added to your inventory or dropped.
Wallet Fetch Syntax: Syntax: wallet.fetch <item short name or id> <amount>
Invalid Item Amount: Item amount must be an integer greater than 0.
Fetch Failed: Couldn't fetch "{0}" from wallet. Inventory may be full.
Wallet Item Rejected: That item is not allowed in the wallet.
Wallet Items Rejected: Your wallet rejected some items. They have been added to your inventory or dropped.
